hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: School is closed through Summer due to COVID-19 precautions and recommendations from CDC and local health officials. Starting April 2nd, the school office is open Monday - Thursday from 8:00am to 12:00pm. Updates will be posted on our website, social media, and sent via email to our families. We appreciate your understanding during this unprecedented time.
A Mission to Create Confident & Creative Students

div.p: Our mission is to assist students to be academically successful, responsible, confident and creative by providing a safe, nurturing and academically challenging environment.
Latest School Board Agenda: April 22, 2020 (Click to view/download)

a.strong: Special Notice regarding Executive Order N-29-20 (online board meetings)

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-EehZO jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Online Data Confirmation is Now Required For All Students - New and Returning

div.p: Starting August 1st, you will be able to log in to your new Parent Portal and confirm your student's data. You will receive an email on how to access your Parent Portal. On August 10th you will be able to log to back in and view your student's teacher name. Once school begins, you can log into your portal at any time to review your student's grades, report cards and state test scores (grade 3-8).

The bridges on Bowman Road east of the school are closed through Winter 2019/20 for the Bowman Road Bridges Improvement project. During this time, access to the school will be significantly impacted during morning drop-off and afternoon pick-up times. Please take a moment to view the information provided by the school and Placer County on the Bowman Road Bridges Improvement Project information page.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: Want to learn more about Bowman?

div.p: Our district charter supports parental choice in a child's education. If you would like more information about becoming a Bowman family, please contact our school office.
